task_summary: The robot arm must pour the contents of a held cup into a mug on the table, executing perception, approach, pouring, and retreat phases.

task_long_description.overview: This task involves a robot arm equipped with a gripper holding a cup, approaching a mug placed on the table, aligning itself accurately above the mug, and performing a pouring motion to transfer liquid from the cup to the mug. The scenario takes place in a controlled lab environment. The primary objects involved are the cup (source) and the mug (target). The robot must ensure precise positioning for an effective pour, avoid spillage, and retreat smoothly after pouring.
preconditions: Mug is positioned on the table
stepwise_plan: Approach and align with the mug
Pour contents from cup into mug
Retreat the cup safely from mug
success_criteria: Cup contents poured into mug with minimal spillage
Robot retreats without contact with mug or table
failure_and_recovery: Failure to detect mug: retry perception
Pour failed: re-position and try pouring again
task_long_description.termination: Task ends when the cup is empty or the pouring cycle is complete and the robot has retreated.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Detect the location of the mug on the table.
Move the gripper holding the cup to align above the mug with high precision.
Perform the pouring action to transfer liquid from the cup to the mug.
Retract the cup away from the mug after pouring.

recovery_strategy: Retry mug detection if initial detection fails
Realign and approach again if misalignment occurs
Retry pour step only if contents remain in cup
Retreat path can be re-planned if obstructed
assumptions: Instruction did not specify source object, but frames showed robot holding a cup; source set as 'cup'.
Amount not specified; 'full' selected for completeness.
Tilt angle observed from frames estimated to be near maximum (approximated as 90 degrees).
Pour rate not visually marked; defaulted to 'normal'.

expected_success_criteria: Successful transfer of liquid from cup to mug with minimal spillage
Reach and maintain correct pour angle
Mug remains in place and upright
